title: Uranium 235/238 buffer (fuel factory feed)
descriptionMarkdown:
## Desc

Store a 1/19 ratio of uranium 235 / 238 in a chest, then provide the fuel factory.

## Storage
* 237 units of uranium 235
* 4500 units of uranium 238

## Working principle

* Store uranium 238 until the storage reach 4500 units
* Store uranium 235 until the storage reach 237 units
* Both overflow and extra uranium 238 are output by the lower belt for other use (ammo factory ...)
* Extra uranium 235 remains and will end up blocking the main belt which which prevents excessive production of the centrifuges.
* Extraction of materials by the fuel factory make the loop.

## Screenshots

![Setup](https://i.imgur.com/AOle9IB.jpg)
- https://i.imgur.com/vluMTr7.jpg
- https://i.imgur.com/UH3jUoc.jpg

## Calc

For a steel chest : 48 slots x 100 units per stack  = 4800 items

Fuel production require 1 uranium 235 and 19 uranium 238 = 20 items

A perfect ratio : 240 uranium 235 / 4560 uranium 238

But 240 items require 3 slots, so final ratio is (48-3) x 100 = 4500 units of uranium 238 and (4500 x 1/19) 236.84... units of uranium 235
